Text: I will be in Houston all day on Wednesday Oct en route to Monterrey for a Board Meeting on Oct and thought of how long it has been since we last met If there is any chance you could fit me into your busy schedule for minutes I would be very appreciative As you may recall I now manage Darby the emerging markets investment firm created by Nick F Brady in We have launched a number of new investment vehicles for Latin America Our Latin American Mezzanine Fund aimed at helping finance infrastructure projects is still the only one of its kind in the Region There should be some interesting opportunities for Enron and Darby to work together I look forward to hearing from you Best personal regards Richard H Frank Richard H Frank Managing Partner COO Darby Overseas Investments Ltd Suite Connecticut Avenue NW Washington DC
